permissions: Allowed for admins. For time sheets on TruckerShiftSet: allowed for trucker managers, broker members of the trucker, or the driver on the shift set. For time sheets on CrewRequirement: allowed for users who are job production plan time card approvers.
side_effects: Creates a time sheet rejection and transitions the associated time sheet status from submitted to rejected.
validation_notes: --time-sheet is required. The referenced time sheet must exist. Time sheet status must be submitted. Action validates the time sheet model and returns validation errors if invalid.

flags.name: --time-sheet
flags.validation: Required. Must reference an existing time sheet.
